meta.title: You.v2 - Rapid Subconscious Reprogramming Program
meta.description: You.v2 is a rapid and gentle subconscious reprogramming program for Russian-speaking global leaders and helping professionals who feel inexplicably blocked by old patterns and beliefs despite external success.

hero.title: You lead, guide, and support others — but you feel it's time to focus on yourself.
hero.subtitle: You.v2 is a structured, personalized subconscious change program for business leaders and helping professionals who need deep results — quickly and reliably.
hero.description1: You don't need more willpower or positive thinking. You need access to the part of your mind where real change begins.
hero.ctaMicrocopy: No obligation. 100% confidential. Best for those who've already tried other approaches.

howItWorks.title: This isn't therapy. It's reprogramming.
howItWorks.description1: Your subconscious is your internal operating system — and it was installed before you had a say. It runs your emotions, your impulses, your loyalties.
howItWorks.description2: Logic doesn't reach it. Coaching can't override it. Motivation bounces off it. That's why most change fails — or exhausts you.
howItWorks.callout: Between your conscious and your subconscious is a firewall: the critical factor. It protects old identity code. Until we bypass it, you'll stay loyal to beliefs you no longer need.
howItWorks.description3: Most traditional approaches work on the levels of environment, behavior, and knowledge. But real change should happen at the level where the problem originated. With my help, you will use deep system-level interventions to rewrite that code — precisely, calmly, permanently.
howItWorks.tagline: We don't fix symptoms. We reprogram the system.
howItWorks.quote: "You've worked hard at the behavior level. It's time to reset where it actually matters."

fullControl.title: You Have Full Control
fullControl.p1: Hypnosis isn't mind control — it's a natural state of focused attention.
fullControl.p1b: It's like being deeply absorbed in a movie, but with the ability to pause or speak up at any time. You hear everything, understand where you are, and choose what you share or withhold. Actually the results will depend on how focused and present you are.
fullControl.p2: In You.v2 method, trance is simply the tool we use to bypass your inner firewall — the "critical factor" that defends outdated patterns. Once we pass it, your subconscious becomes available for re-alignment.
fullControl.p3: If you've seen hypnosis in movies or on TV, forget it — this is different. A hypnotic trance is a natural state of mind. Nothing spooky is going on. You won't accept any suggestions you are not willing to accept. You won't reveal any secrets either.
fullControl.p4: My method is safe because it respects your values, religion, and privacy — and above all, your free will.

theWhy.title: The Why
theWhy.promise: Through this work, I'll teach you how to access and use the power of your own subconscious mind — so that you can stop self-sabotaging, achieve your goals more easily, and continue creating meaningful change long after our work is done.
theWhy.vision: My work is about more than personal change. It's about breaking generational patterns, removing invisible blocks, and making sure that the pain you carry doesn't get passed down to your children. I do this because I like to create more happy people around me by liberating them from their subconscious limiting beliefs and patterns that no longer serve them.

isThisForYou.title: Is This For You?
bullets: You've outgrown traditional therapy and mindset tools
You feel stuck or unhappy despite external success
You help others every day, but need to work on your own stuff too
People look up to you, so you have no one to turn to for help in your social circle
isThisForYou.description1: This work is especially effective for people in helping roles — coaches, therapists, doctors, lawyers, business leaders — because you understand change, and you're ready to do the work that goes beyond what most methods can reach.
isThisForYou.description2: This work is for people who are truly ready. Not to cope, not to hope — but to actually change.

clientStories.title: Client Stories
stories: After just one session, I felt like years of emotional weight lifted off. — Anna, Executive Coach
This work gave me tools I still use every day — real transformation. — Anthony, Tech Founder
I've done coaching, therapy, even retreats. Nothing got to the root like this did. The shifts were deep and lasting. — Elena, Entrepreneur
I didn't expect to feel this clear after just two weeks. I finally stopped repeating the same self-destructive cycle. — Dmitry, Product Manager

whatMakesDifferent.title: What Makes You.v2 Different?

differentiators.title: Structured work with defined time frame
differentiators.desc: Not an open-ended process—get results fast with a proven protocol.

differentiators.title: Personal engineering, not therapy
differentiators.desc: Uses subconscious methods (regression, parts work) for real, structural change.

differentiators.title: Clear, lasting outcome
differentiators.desc: Internal reprogramming that sticks—not just coping tools or advice.

differentiators.title: Confidential & deep
differentiators.desc: A safe space for complex emotional, behavioral, or compulsive patterns.

whatMakesDifferent.quote: Other methods help you cope. I help you rewrite the code.

issues.title: Issues We Can Address
issues.intro: I work with professionals who have achieved a lot — yet still feel that something isn't right beneath the surface. Here are just a few areas where subconscious reprogramming can create powerful change:

items.title: Everything looks fine — but you feel lost inside
items.desc: You have the success, the income, the stability. But you feel numb, empty, or directionless. This isn't depression — it's often a sign you've outgrown your old identity, and it's time to build a new one.

items.title: External success — but love feels impossible
items.desc: You've built a career, solved big problems, earned respect. But in relationships, you keep hitting the same walls: distance, pain, self-doubt. It's not bad luck — it reflects a root issue.

items.title: Money comes — and then disappears
items.desc: You earn well, but you can't grow further. Fear of big numbers, guilt around success, inner conflict between safety and freedom — this isn't about the market. It's about your internal structure.

items.title: You — or someone close — suddenly changed
items.desc: After an illness, surgery, accident, or even intense stress, something feels off. Like part of you is missing. This work helps with what logic can't explain.

items.title: You don't want to become your parents — but you're already repeating them
items.desc: Guilt, frustration, emotional distance with your child — these often echo patterns you lived through yourself. We can stop inherited pain from passing forward.

items.title: Irrational moods, fears, or desires
items.desc: Anxiety, irritability, mood swings, irrational fears and urges — these aren't flaws in your personality. They're often signs your subconscious is working overtime to manage something unresolved.

items.title: Unexplained physical symptoms or habits
items.desc: Compulsive behaviors, physical tension, headaches, and unexplained symptoms often start as the subconscious trying to protect you. They need to be decoded and processed — not ignored.

issues.outro: Every person is different. If you don't see your situation here — reach out. I work with people, not labels. Every story can be rewritten.

results.title: Results
bullets: Let go of guilt, anxiety, and suppressed rage — before they sabotage another relationship or opportunity
Break through years of emotional fog — and finally feel like yourself again
Reclaim your sense of purpose — even when your old identity has collapsed and nothing feels real anymore
Cut through the confusion — and trust yourself to act, speak, and choose without overthinking everything
Defuse the panic, conflict, and reactivity — even if it's been wrecking your relationships or work
Pull your relationships back from the edge — when distance, resentment, or silence have taken over
Release the internal brake on your success — the one that's been quietly destroying everything you've built for years
Find a solid core of peace — even in moments that used to rip you apart
results.pullQuote: When you discover the version of yourself that was buried underneath all the noise, the change will be instantaneous and permanent.

precision.title: Clinical-Grade Precision
precision.intro: I don't follow scripts. I don't work from templates. This isn't about motivation or mindset — it's about reprogramming the systems that run your inner world.

bullets.heading: It's deep because it has to be.
bullets.desc: I work at the level where real patterns live — and that takes more skill, more care, and more responsibility than surface-level tools.

bullets.heading: I've seen the edge — and know when to stop.
bullets.desc: I've worked with real psychiatric and cognitive cases. I know when something is outside scope — and I know what's safe.

bullets.heading: This isn't just knowledge. It's lived expertise.
bullets.desc: Medical training. Systems thinking. Subconscious work. Clinical research. This isn't a method I bought — it's the result of everything I've studied, seen, and tested in real life.

bullets.heading: I've Been There — That's Why I Know It Works.
bullets.desc: I've done this work myself. I know what it's like to carry patterns you didn't choose — and to break them. That's why I take this process seriously. It's not theory. It's personal.

rows.depth: Deep, ecological, and complete resolution of your issue

about.quote: "I don't give advice or teach to think positively. I change internal architecture. Gently. Precisely. Permanently."

globalPros.title: Built for Global Russian-Speaking Professionals
globalPros.subtitle: You work and think in English. But your subconscious mind was programmed in your first language. Therapy in English misses your roots. Therapy in Russian misses your real life.
globalPros.preludeHighlight: In short, you need someone who understands both the life you live now — and the "multiki" you watched as a kid.
points: I work in English, Russian, or both — whatever your mind needs.
I was raised to succeed and stay silent — I know what that costs.
I've worked through the legacy of a difficult past — and I'll help you do the same.
globalPros.quote: You succeed in English, but your inner child still speaks Russian.
globalPros.ctaPrompt: Ready to integrate both sides of yourself?

work.result: You return with clarity — and often visible behavioral shifts by the next session

clientStory.title: Client Story
clientStory.quote: "I was stuck for 7 months, circling the same project and feeling blocked. By the third session, something unhooked — I launched it, and we did $90k. But more than that? I actually felt calm doing it."
clientStory.author: — Anonymous founder, Berlin
clientStory.femalePerspective: "I held everyone else together, balancing leadership and personal well-being felt impossible until I found a space to truly reset." — Anonymous You V2 Client

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. This is not psychotherapy, and I don't treat mental illness. This is structural subconscious work — faster, deeper, and focused on transformation, not support.

items.question: Is it safe to go that deep?
items.answer: Yes — when done with the right experience and boundaries. I've worked with complex psychological cases and know when to slow down, when to pause, and when to refer out.

items.question: I've already done therapy or coaching.
items.answer: This is great, you are on the path! Most clients come to me after years of personal work and trying different things. That means you're ready to go deeper, and this work will build on - not devalue - what you've already done.

items.question: Do I have to believe in hypnosis?
items.answer: No. Hypnosis is a natural state of mind. It is about how your nervous system and subconscious actually function — not belief or ritual. The only thing you need to do is to be open to the process.

items.question: How many sessions do I need?
items.answer: The full structure includes six sessions. Some clients feel major shifts within one or two. But long-term change needs all six — that's when the new structure locks in.

items.question: Will I give out all my secrets?
items.answer: No. You will be fully aware of what is happening and you will be able to control your thoughts and actions. You will have full discretion over what you are willing to share and what ideas you are willing to incorporate.

items.question: So I just relax and let you do the work?
items.answer: Not quite! Every session is a collaboration. You will need to participate and do your part of the work. This is not a guided nap time! Please come to the sessions well rested and ready to rock-n-roll!

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: I stand by the depth and quality of this work. My pledge to you is that the value of this transformation over time will be much more than your investment. This being said, if after the first two sessions we both feel that it's not a fit, I'll refund the remaining portion of the program.

pricing.description: You.v2 is a high-touch, personalized hypnotherapy experience designed for powerful, high-functioning people who are ready to stop self-sabotage and step fully into aligned living. Some prefer an immersive experience. Others need spacious integration. That's why I offer two pathways to the same transformation:

premium.title: 🔥 The 17-Day Intensive
premium.description: For those who are ready to go all in.
features: Fast, immersive format — 90 minute 1:1 sessions every 2–3 days
Requires full emotional commitment and calendar priority
Ideal for founders, creatives, and leaders in transition or crisis
premium.quote: If you want a complete system reset — and you're ready now — this is the path.
premium.pricing: Premium-tier investment. Only 2 clients accepted per month.

core.title: 🌱 The 6-Week Repatterning
core.description: For those who want transformation with integration.
features: Time to reflect, observe, and stabilize between sessions
Same framework, adapted to your nervous system's pace
Ideal for high-achievers managing life demands alongside deep work
core.quote: If you want to go deep without overwhelm, this is your space.
core.pricing: Core-tier investment. Only 4 clients accepted per month.

framework.title: Same Framework. Two Paces.
bullets: Mapping your symbolic and emotional terrain
Uncovering root beliefs and patterns
Rewiring subconscious pathways through trance-based work
Integrating new internal logic and long-term access tools
framework.note: This is not mindset coaching. This is subconscious repatterning — done with surgical precision and deep containment.

whyMe.title: Why Work With Me
whyMe.intro: My role is not to fix you. It's to help you unlock what's already within. I live and thrive between worlds — between English and Russian, medicine and engineering, the scientific and the spiritual. That's why I can guide you through transformation that's not only deep - but precise, not just emotional - but effective.
bullets: Depth and speed: Profound change doesn't need to take years. My clients experience deep shifts in weeks, not months.
Clinical rigor meets inner wisdom: As a physician with postdoctoral training at Yale and UCSD, I integrate scientific depth with intuitive precision — minus the fluff.
Safe masculine presence: For both powerful women and high-performing men — I create a judgment-free and non-threatening space where you can feel safe, supported, and respected.

Bilingual and bicultural: This program was specifically developed for Russian speaking expats navigating life between two cultures. Even if you think in English today, your inner child still speaks Russian. But you also need someone who can understand the realities of your today's life.
Nothing is too much: We'll address the things you've never said out loud — without fear, shame, or avoidance. The work can be context-free: you only share what you can safely share.

Both art and science: No pre-determined templates or scripts, because every person is different and every session is different. Together, we will craft and go through a process which reflects your mind and your life - not somebody else's.

footer.tagline: You.v2 — Your next version isn't out there. It's already within. Let's unlock it.

readyToChoose.title: Ready to Begin Your Path?
readyToChoose.p1: This is not a sales pitch — it's a discovery conversation. You'll gain visibility into what's truly going on beneath the surface and map your best next step.
readyToChoose.p2: This 60-minute strategy call is $100 — credited toward your program if you choose to continue. You'll walk away with clear insight into what's keeping you stuck, and what needs to shift at the subconscious level. My pledge is that this conversation will be deeply useful to you — even if you don't decide to go through the full program at this time.
readyToChoose.p3: To give you my full presence and focus, I never do back-to-back sessions. I work with two clients per day max — so your transformation gets everything I've got. As a result, I can only accept up to 4 new clients per month for deep, individualized transformation. Spots fill quickly — if you feel you're ready, book now and let's talk.
